amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Drug Enforcement Administration and for Community Oriented Policing Services.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for the Community Oriented Policing Services by $10 million. Amendment also seeks to increase funding for the Drug Enforcement Administration by $10 million. Amendment reduces funding for the 2010 decennial census by $10 million. Amendment also seeks to reduce funding for the salaries and expenses of the Bureau of the Census by $10 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Baird amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 260 - 168 (Roll no. 248).
